Uses of Package
org.fcrepo.kernel.services

  • Packages that use org.fcrepo.kernel.services 
    Package Description
    org.fcrepo.http.commons
    Common abstractions for module's sub-packages.
    org.fcrepo.http.commons.session
    Types and implementation classes that define and provide sessions.
    org.fcrepo.kernel
    This package contains abstractions for FedoraResource types and some types and functionality for Transactions.
    org.fcrepo.kernel.rdf  
    org.fcrepo.kernel.rdf.impl  
    org.fcrepo.kernel.services  
    org.fcrepo.serialization
    This package provides serialization capability.
  • Classes in org.fcrepo.kernel.services used by org.fcrepo.http.commons 
    Class and Description
    DatastreamService
    Service for creating and retrieving Datastreams without using the JCR API.
    NodeService
    Service for managing access to Fedora 'nodes' (either datastreams or objects, we don't care.)
    ObjectService
    Service for creating and retrieving FedoraObjects without using the JCR API.
    VersionService
    This service exposes management of node versioning.
  • Classes in org.fcrepo.kernel.services used by org.fcrepo.http.commons.session 
    Class and Description
    TransactionService
    This is part of the strawman implementation for Fedora transactions This service implements a simple Transaction service which is able to create/commit/rollback Transaction objects A Scheduled annotation is used for removing timed out Transactions
  • Classes in org.fcrepo.kernel.services used by org.fcrepo.kernel 
    Class and Description
    VersionService
    This service exposes management of node versioning.
  • Classes in org.fcrepo.kernel.services used by org.fcrepo.kernel.rdf 
    Class and Description
    LowLevelStorageService
    Service for managing access to low-level binary blobs (which may include redundant copies, etc)
  • Classes in org.fcrepo.kernel.services used by org.fcrepo.kernel.rdf.impl 
    Class and Description
    LowLevelStorageService
    Service for managing access to low-level binary blobs (which may include redundant copies, etc)
  • Classes in org.fcrepo.kernel.services used by org.fcrepo.kernel.services 
    Class and Description
    LowLevelStorageService
    Service for managing access to low-level binary blobs (which may include redundant copies, etc)
    RepositoryService
    Repository-global helper methods
  • Classes in org.fcrepo.kernel.services used by org.fcrepo.serialization 
    Class and Description
    DatastreamService
    Service for creating and retrieving Datastreams without using the JCR API.
    ObjectService
    Service for creating and retrieving FedoraObjects without using the JCR API.
